Package org.eodisp.remote.registry

A registry mechanism for the Java extensible remote method invocation (Jeri) similar to the one provided by standard RMI.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
JeriRegistry  
 

Class Summary
JeriRegistryImpl A simple implementation of the RMI registry interface for Jeri
LocateJeriRegistry This is a similar class as the LocateRegistry from standard java RMI.
 

Package org.eodisp.remote.registry Description

A registry mechanism for the Java extensible remote method invocation (Jeri) similar to the one provided by standard RMI.
